title: Dev identity: local user seeding (Convex)
description: Add a development helper to create a local user identity and simulate auth for local testing.
requirements: Seed user with fixed Id<'users'> and email
Development-only identity injection for HTTP requests
plan: Create a mutation to upsert a dev user

expected_outcome: Local user present; queries scoped by identity work in dev.
acceptance_criteria: Running seed twice does not duplicate
API requests in dev include that user identity
